Description: An overview of the OxSalt care bundle.
A written version of the script for the learning presentation.
The Powerpoint version of the presentation and includes a soundtrack of the script.
A booklet with information about salt and health.
A booklet with information about the salt content of a range of foods.

A 2-sided document that could be folded and carried for use when shopping. On one side is a shopping guide that indicates red, amber and green choices. On the other side is a table showing how much salt would be in a portion of a particular size.
A 2-sided reminder about salt and sodium. Can be printed out on a credit-card sized piece of plastic or cardboard.
A 2-sided document with seasoning recipes on one side and dining out tips on the other side
A simple document that can be used to write out shopping lists and has reminders about salt on it.
Snapshots of the original OxSalt website.
A simple food diary that can be used if participants want to monitor their salt intake.
The schedule of emails and SMS text messages.
The content of the emails and SMS text messages.
